climbs.name: Zippy's Day Out
climbs.fa: Larry Kepley, Steve Lowry, Robert Price

content.description: Dihedral crack that has a little bit of everything with a slightly overhanging topout
content.protection: pad, or fist size pro if you want to rope up
content.location: As you come around the north side of the boulder with Ding Dongs and Taco Sauce, it will be to the NWN

content.description: Overhanging hand/fist crack that thins to fingers when difficulty eases
content.location: West side of boulder where Ding Dongs and Taco Sauce is located. Downclimb SW side of boulder or boulder hop from NW side to other boulders with easy down climb

content.description: Overhanging hand/fist roof crack that turns a lip and thins down to tight hands and fingers as angle goes back to vertical. The roof crack is about 15 ft. long and you are actually climbing downhill until near the lip. Once the lip is turned, the route tops out about 25 ft. above the ground
content.protection: Pro is obvious- Widgets and shinies as you desire
content.location: Obvious crack splitting large boulder almost perfectly in half. Easily visible from Frontside/Loop trails as you near Turkey Peak

content.description: On the eastern flanks of the Main Dome
